# HOQCenc

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

HOQCenc contains routines for encryption and decryption of character strings and text files

## Installation

You can install this version from GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("HanOostdijk/HOQCenc",build_vignettes=TRUE) 
```
